name: Red Tie Runner
description:
Red Tie Runner is a simple but challenging 2D platformer. Put on a red tie and step into stick-figure shoes to navigate through 30 levels so intense you might just forget about the impending heat death of the universe.

Features

  • 🎵 Cozy soundtrack
  • 🕹️ Outdated platforming mechanics that were already outdated when this game came out 10 years ago
  • 📜 Dynamic scrolling levels
  • 💎 Ultra stunning hyper realistic next generation graphics
  • 💔 May or may not fix your marriage
  • 💸 Absolutely Free— because the best things in life are
  • 🚫 A variety of hazards and enemies to overcome
  • 🚀 Ziplines and stuff
  • 🌍 It's not just a game, it's a lifestyle.
